name: Paid in Full
description:
When your Fatui Pyro Agent, who has this card equipped, creates a Stealth, it will have the following effects:
Starting Usage(s) +1, the Physical DMG the attached character deals will be converted to Pyro DMG.
descriptionraw: When your $[A2301], who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C123012]</color>, it will have the following effects:\nStarting $[K3] +1, the $[K100] the attached character deals will be converted to $[K103].
descriptionreplaced: When your Fatui Pyro Agent, who has this card equipped, creates a <color=#FFFFFFFF>Stealth</color>, it will have the following effects:\nStarting <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color> +1, the {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color> the attached character deals will be converted to {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color>.
